title: The Cliff
resume: A Reykjavik crime detective is sent to a small rural community in Iceland to help a young local policewoman investigate a suspicious accident. Together they unravel a mystery that involves bizarre incidents and unexplained deaths, set against the backdrop of a controversial hydroelectric project.
character: Homicide and Violent Crimes Detective Helgi Marvinsson
